answers.answer: phimosis is not contagious. It's something that can happen in males who aren't circumsized.  It can happen for many reasons - you can google it for more info.  in the future if it reoccurs I don't recommend using any otc antibiotic ointments on your penis. Many folks can have reactions to them when used on our sensitive genital areas.  I also do not recommend using lemon juice either.  The skin in the genital area is too sensitive for something that acidic.  I would recommend you see a dermatologist or an urologist if it reoccurs to find out what the underlying cause of it is and get properly treated since your regular doctor doesn't seem to be very concerned about making sure you get proper treatment.  diabetes can put you at risk for fungal infections too which is worth following up on if this reoccurs.also this is not the doctor's forum so if you want their advice - you have to post it over there and pay for their opinion.grace
